attributes.additional_details:
I want a review of fuel prices because every individual who purchases fuel at the pumps is being overcharged.
Why? All petrol stations advertise their fuel at prices which a physically impossible to collect from the customer ( eg 136.7 per litre) how does the supplier take the .7 from you. Answer they don't they automatically take it to the next whole number. Result it is impossible to buy a litre of fuel at the advertised price. Basically we are being ripped off!
